text: Luciano do Valle Queirós, (4 July 1947 - 19 April 2014) better known as Luciano do Valle was a Brazilian sports commentator, television presenter, journalist and entrepreneur. He worked on several broadcasters on television-- Rede Globo from 1971 to 1982, Rede Record from 1982 to 1983 and 2003 to 2006, and Rede Bandeirantes from 1983 to 2003 and 2006, to his death. He was born in Campinas, São Paulo. Luciano do Valle died on the afternoon of 19 April, 2014 in Uberlândia, Minas Gerais, aged 66. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1947 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Writers from São Paulo Category:Businesspeople from São Paulo Category:Brazilian journalists Category:Sports commentators Category:Brazilian television presenters Category:People from Campinas
title: Luciano do Valle
